name: MountainBall
description:
Very leisurely buddhist department's shoot basketball small game
In the game, free, no victory, no defeat; There is no time limit.
Just endless shoot basketball.

Take the subway, wait for the bus, eat, throw a few balls at any time.

You can also compete for rankings and get the highest score.

Many kinds of basketball skin waiting for you to unlock

If you have any problems in the game, please contact bendary@foxmail.com
